item.description:
Let's dance and just make it a crazy night to remember or a night we can't remember. Details of the bus is posted below just how it is on my facebook......
---
I am looking for the best 30 people to have fun and make it an epic night for all to remember this Friday for my birthday.

$50 reserves your spot on the bus + Top Shelf Liquor & Beer, Food and your way in to JayZ's 40/40 in NYC... No lie the bus transform into a club on wheels and it will be one of the best night outs you've had.

Meet up is at 9pm at The Taft in Downtown New Haven, Bus will leave at 10pm. We'll hit 2 spots in New York while on our way to the 40/40. And will return to New Haven @ 4am.

The $50 ARE DUE ASAP before Friday after then It's first come, first serve with other people that will be invited from my co-host that is also hosting her bday on the bus.

Any questions, suggestions, want to bring a friend, etc. call/text 860.357.7264
item.why: I'm hosting a bus party to NYC for my 27th birthday. My last 3 have been great success and i want this last one to be it too. I have 20 slots open for whoever to take first.
item.name: Bus Party to NYC
